name: rshahportfoiliosite
description: - 08/30/2021 removed .htaccess and updated Procfile to use public_html as docroot - Profile tells Heroku how to deploy - Composer.json mentions what libraries will be used  - public_html contains all public facing content - partials will be templates/partial pages that will NOT be accessed directly (still can reference via code) - lib will be custom functions/libraries/etc that will NOT be accessed directly (still can be referenced via code) - All work will be subfolders inside public_html (for the most part), lib will contain reusable functionality, partials will contain reusable templates, nothing else should change.
